abstract: Meredith Vieira, the host of the syndicated game show, said she was moving on to a “new adventure” with NBC that she did not provide details for, adding that it was “the right time to make the move.”
snippet: Meredith Vieira, the host of the syndicated game show, said she was moving on to a “new adventure” with NBC that she did not provide details for, adding that it was “the right time to make the move.”
lead_paragraph: Disney is searching for a new host for the syndicated game show “Who Wants to be a Millionaire.”

headline.main: Vieira to Leave ‘Who Wants to Be a Millionaire’
headline.print_headline: Meredith Vieira to Leave ‘Who Wants to Be a Millionaire’
